statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Orlando Coleman scored 12 points and grabbed four rebounds as Texas Southern notched its third-straight conference win, rolling to a 64-38 victory over Prairie View on Saturday night.
article.headline: Texas Southern rolls to 64-38 win over Prairie View
article.linkText: Texas Southern rolls to 64-38 win over Prairie View
article.story: HOUSTON -- Orlando Coleman scored 12 points and grabbed four rebounds as Texas Southern notched its third-straight conference win, rolling to a 64-38 victory over Prairie View on Saturday night. Coleman was 5 of 11 including two from distance for the Tigers (4-11, 3-0 Southwestern Athletic Conference). Chris Thomas added nine points and nine rebounds, David Blanks had nine points and eight rebounds, Malcolm Riley had nine points and five rebounds and Derrick Griffin had eight points and nine rebounds. Texas Southern averaged 44.6 percent shooting from the field, 58.8 percent from the line and had a 46-26 rebounding edge over Prairie View. Texas Southern led 30-19 at the break and cruised in the second half to the win. Jayrn Johnson scored 16 points off the bench for the Panthers (1-14, 1-2).
